regex.name: max-cookie-referer
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url='$doregex[select_Url]'): import re import requests headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:44.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/44.0 Iceweasel/44.0'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) maxi = re.findall('(http.*)', source.text)[0] clean=maxi.replace('|','%7C') cookie2 = source.cookies['_g'] return clean + '|Referer=http://tutvgratis.tv/&Cookie=_g=' + cookie2

regex.name: select_Url
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:44.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/44.0 Iceweasel/44.0
